text: Hazlehurst may refer to the following places in the United States: *Hazlehurst, Georgia *Hazlehurst, Mississippi ==People with the surname== *Noni Hazlehurst, Australian actress *Ronnie Hazlehurst (1928-2007), musician known for his work for the BBC *Thomas Hazlehurst (artist) (c.1740-c.1821), English miniature painter *Thomas Hazlehurst (businessman) (1779-1842), businessman *Thomas Hazlehurst (chapel builder) (1816-1876), son of the above, noted as a chapel builder ==See also== *Hazlehurst & Sons of Runcorn, Cheshire, England, soap and alkali manufacturers *Hazelhurst (disambiguation)
title: Hazlehurst
